importExport.exportZipTooltip: Export selected projects as ZIP archive

templates.chooseTemplate: Choose a template to quickly set up your project
templates.clickToCreate: Click to create project from this template

codingAssistant.name: Coding Assistant
codingAssistant.description: AI-powered coding help with code reviews, debugging, and documentation
codingAssistant.instructions: You are an expert software developer. Help with coding tasks, code reviews, debugging, and technical documentation. Always provide clean, well-documented code examples.

researchProject.name: Research Project
researchProject.description: Organize research with AI-assisted analysis and summarization
researchProject.instructions: You are a research assistant. Help analyze documents, summarize findings, and organize research materials. Provide citations and references when possible.

businessStrategy.name: Business Strategy
businessStrategy.description: Strategic planning and business analysis with AI insights
businessStrategy.instructions: You are a business strategist. Help with market analysis, competitive research, and strategic planning. Provide actionable insights and recommendations.

creativeWriting.name: Creative Writing
creativeWriting.description: Writing assistant for stories, articles, and creative content
creativeWriting.instructions: You are a creative writing assistant. Help with storytelling, character development, and prose improvement. Provide constructive feedback and suggestions.

startupLaunch.name: Startup Launch
startupLaunch.description: Plan and execute your startup idea with AI guidance
startupLaunch.instructions: You are a startup advisor. Help with product development, go-to-market strategy, and pitch preparation. Provide practical, actionable advice for early-stage founders.

learningPath.name: Learning Path
learningPath.description: Personalized learning with AI tutoring and study plans
learningPath.instructions: You are a patient and knowledgeable tutor. Help create personalized learning paths, explain complex concepts, and provide practice exercises. Adapt to the learner's pace and style.

personalJournal.name: Personal Journal
personalJournal.description: Reflective journaling with AI prompts and insights
personalJournal.instructions: You are a thoughtful companion for personal reflection. Help with journaling prompts, goal setting, and self-discovery. Be supportive and non-judgmental.

blankProject.name: Blank Project
blankProject.description: Start fresh with a clean slate

projectDetail.startNewChatToAdd: Start a new chat to add sessions to this project
projectDetail.deleteWarning: Deleting this project will not delete associated sessions, but they will be unlinked.
projectDetail.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"? This action cannot be undone. Sessions will be unlinked but not deleted.
projectDetail.removeSessionConfirmation: Remove this session from the project? The session will not be deleted, just unlinked from this project.

knowledgeBase.title: Knowledge Base
knowledgeBase.uploadHint: Upload files or add content manually to build your knowledge base
knowledgeBase.addFileDesc: Add a new file to your knowledge base manually.
knowledgeBase.contentPlaceholder: Paste or type your content here...
knowledgeBase.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this file? This action cannot be undone.
knowledgeBase.deleteMultipleConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete {count} files? This action cannot be undone.

projectEnv.title: Project Environments
projectEnv.description: Configure development environments for your projects.
projectEnv.addProjectDesc: Associate a development environment with your project.
projectEnv.autoActivateDesc: Automatically activate environment when opening project
projectEnv.name: Name
